ã“ã®ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’å‹•ã‹ã™ã«ã¯ NASA API ã‚­ãƒ¼ãŒå¿…è¦1 ã ãŒï¼Œãªã„å ´åˆã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ¢ç”¨ã® DEMO_KEY ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦å‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹ã€‚ ãŸã ã— DEMO_KEY ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®åˆ¶é™ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã”æ³¨æ„ã‚’ã€‚

$ apod -h
CLI Tool for Astronomy Picture of the Day with NASA API.

Usage:
  apod [flags]
  apod [command]

Available Commands:
  download    Download NASA APOD data
  help        Help about any command
  lookup      Look up NASA APOD data
  version     Print the version number

Flags:
      --api-key string      NASA API key
      --config string       Config file (default /home/username/.config/apod/config.yaml)
      --count int           count randomly chosen images
      --date string         date of the APOD image to retrieve (YYYY-MM-DD)
      --debug               for debug
      --end-date string     end of a date range (YYYY-MM-DD)
  -h, --help                help for apod
      --start-date string   start of a date range (YYYY-MM-DD)
      --thumbs              return the URL of video thumbnail

Use "apod [command] --help" for more information about a command.

--date, --start-date, --end-date, --count, --thumbs, --api-key å„ãƒ•ãƒ©ã‚°ã¯ APOD API ã®ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã«å¯¾å¿œã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

API Parameter Flags Description
date --date the date of the APOD image to retrieve
start_date --start-date the start of a date range
end_date --end-date the end of the date range
count --count randomly chosen images will be returned
thumbs --thumbs return the URL of video thumbnail

    "explanation": "Planetary nebula Jones-Emberson 1 is the death shroud of a dying Sun-like star. It lies some 1,600 light-years from Earth toward the sharp-eyed constellation Lynx. Visible near the center of the planetary nebula is what remains of the stellar core, a blue-hot white dwarf star.  Also known as PK 164 +31.1, the nebula is faint and very difficult to glimpse at a telescope's eyepiece. package main

import (
    "errors"
    "fmt"
    "io"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/errs"
)

func generateMultiError() error {
    return errs.New("error with multiple causes", errs.WithCause(errors.Join(os.ErrInvalid, io.EOF)))
}

func main() {
    err := generateMultiError()
    fmt.Println(errors.Is(err, io.EOF)) // true
}

ã¦ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«æ›¸ãã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã€‚ ã¡ãªã¿ã«

func main() {
    err := generateMultiError()

func Unwraps(err error) []error {
    if err != nil {
        if es, ok := err.(interface {
            Unwrap() []error
        }); ok {
            return es.Unwrap()
        }
    }
    e := errors.Unwrap(err)
    if e != nil {
        return []error{e}
    }
    return nil
}

entry.content:
ãƒã‚°å ±å‘ŠãŒæ­¢ã¾ã‚‰ãªã„ã€‚ ã”ã‚ã‚“ãªã•ã„ ã”ã‚ã‚“ãªã•ã„ ã”ã‚ã‚“ãªã•ã„…

ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã§ github.com/goark/go-cvss ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã® v1.5.0 ã‚’ãƒªãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹ã—ãŸã€‚

  • Release v1.5.0 Â· goark/go-cvss Â· GitHub

ã“ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§ CVSSv2 ã®ãƒ‡ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¡Œã†ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ v2/base ã‹ã‚‰ v2/metric ã«ç§»è¡Œã—ãŸã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã€‚

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/go-cvss/v2/metric"
)

func main() {
    bm, err := metric.NewBase().Decode("AV:N/AC:L/Au:N/C:N/I:N/A:C") //CVE-2002-0392
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    fmt.Printf("Severity: %v (%v)\n", bm.Severity(), bm.Score())
    // Output:

CVSS ã®ãƒ™ã‚¯ã‚¿æ–‡å­—åˆ—ï¼ˆCVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H1 ãªã©ï¼‰ã®ãƒãƒªãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’å³å¯†ã«è¡Œã†ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ãŸã€‚ ä»Šã¾ã§ãƒ™ã‚¯ã‚¿æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã® parse ã¯ã‹ãªã‚Šç·©ãã—ã¦ã„ã¦ï¼Œ metric åãŒé‡è¤‡ã—ã¦ã¦ã‚‚ï¼ˆå¾Œå‹ã¡ã§ï¼‰æœ‰åŠ¹ã«ã—ã¦ãŸã—ï¼Œå¤§æ–‡å­—å°æ–‡å­—ã‚‚é–¢ä¿‚ãªãæœ‰åŠ¹ã«ã—ã¦ã„ãŸãŒï¼Œä»•æ§˜çš„ã«ã‚ã‹ã‚“ã‚„ã‚ï¼Œã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã§ã€‚ ã“ã‚Œã«ä¼´ã„ï¼Œå¤ã„ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ drop ã—ãŸï¼ˆã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ç®¡ç†ãŒç…©é›‘ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§ï¼‰ã€‚

ä½¿ã„æ–¹ã¯ä»Šã¾ã§ã¨å¤‰ã‚ã‚‰ãš

package main

import (
	"flag"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"os"

	"github.com/goark/go-cvss/v3/metric"
	"github.com/goark/go-cvss/v3/report"
	"golang.org/x/text/language"
)

var template = "- `{{ .Vector }}`" + `
- {{ .SeverityName }}: {{ .SeverityValue }} (Score: {{ .BaseScore }})

| {{ .BaseMetrics }} | {{ .BaseMetricValue }} |
|--------|-------|
| {{ .AVName }} | {{ .AVValue }} |
| {{ .ACName }} | {{ .ACValue }} |
| {{ .PRName }} | {{ .PRValue }} |
| {{ .UIName }} | {{ .UIValue }} |
| {{ .SName }} | {{ .SValue }} |
| {{ .CName }} | {{ .CValue }} |
| {{ .IName }} | {{ .IValue }} |
| {{ .AName }} | {{ .AValue }} |
`

func main() {
	flag.Parse()
	if flag.NArg() < 1 {
		fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, "Set CVSS vector")
		return
	}
	bm, err := metric.NewBase().Decode(flag.Arg(0))
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "%+v\n", err)
		return
	}
	r, err := report.NewBase(bm, report.WithOptionsLanguage(language.Japanese)).ExportWithString(template)
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "%+v\n", err)
		return
	}
	if _, err := io.Copy(os.Stdout, r); err != nil {
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "%+v\n", err)
	}
}
